name: Mooshie's Kitchen 2
description:
Welcome back to Mooshie's Kitchen! Things have changed since you were last here...

In Mooshie's Kitchen 2, you play as Todd once again. After escaping Mooshie's, Todd is approached by the FBI and the US government to go back to Mooshie's Kitchen on a top-secret black operations mission to stop Mooshie once and for all! If Todd succeeds, he'll be given tax-exempt status and will never have to pay taxes in his life again!

There are 2 endings.

Upon completing the game, you'll be able to play the Endless Mode. In this mode, you can fight endless waves of cannibals and see how long you can survive!

Be sure to leave a rating and let me know what you thought!

Play the first game here:
